articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Ideological Officials
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Ideological Officials
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the participants in the 8th Conference of the Ideological Officials of the WPK.
					 When Kim Jong Un came to the venue of the photo session, all the participants broke into cheers of "hurrah!"
					
					 Waving back to their enthusiastic cheers, he extended warm greetings to them.
					
					 Noting that the conference unprecedented in its scale in the history of the WPK marked a significant occasion of making a new milestone in glorifying for all ages the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who always led the WPK and the Korean revolution to victory by dint of ideology and in raising a strong wind of ideological campaign, information and agitation as required by the developing reality, he congratulated the participants on successfully holding the conference amid high enthusiasm.
					
					 Very great are the trust and expectation of the party for the ideological officials, he said. Expressing expectation and conviction that they would arouse all the service personnel and people to the grand drive for ushering in a golden age of Songun Korea by launching a campaign all at once on the party ideological front, he had a photo session with them.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Kim Chang Sop, Jo Yon Jun, Kim Kyong Ok, Ri Jae Il, Choe Hwi, Hwang Pyong So, Tong Yong Il and chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the WPK.

articles.title: Conference of Ideological Officials of WPK Closes
articles.content:
Conference of Ideological Officials of WPK Closes
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The second-day session of the 8th Conference of Ideological Officials of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was held with splendor on Tuesday.
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was present at the conference.
					
					 When he appeared on the platform of the conference hall, all participants broke into loud cheers and enthusiastic applauses.
					
					 He warmly acknowledged them and extended a warm salute to the participants who have devoted themselves to developing the party ideological work.
					
					 More speeches were made.
					
					 Speakers said that they have fully prepared all party members and other working people as vanguard fighters who devotedly protect the leader, deeply trusting and following the party and the leader only by relying on the well-regulated ideological work system, information and agitation methods and education bases, true to President Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's line of attaching importance to ideology.
					
					 They noted that they have deeply grasped the validity and vitality of the theories and methods of the party ideological work in the period when they have powerfully encouraged the masses in the drive for embodying the Party's ideology and upholding its policies by giving play to their revolutionary enthusiasm and creative ingenuity through the thorough application of the information and agitation methods of the anti-Japanese guerrilla style and a brisk three-revolution red flag movement.
					
					 They emphasized the immortal leadership exploits the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu performed in the drive for modeling the whole society on the monolithic idea by setting forth the Juche-oriented theory of ideology and the greatness and great vitality of their ideas and theories and analyzed and reviewed the successes, experience and shortcomings gained in the party ideological work in the past.
					
					 They called on the ideological workers to understand and confirm once again the importance of the party ideological work in the important historic period of carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche and successfully realize the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism by concentrating every effort on more thoroughly establishing the monolithic leadership system of the party and consolidating the unity and cohesion of the party and revolutionary ranks in thought and purpose as firm as a rock.
					
					 They renewed their determination to make a positive contribution to giving fullest play to the mental power of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea in building a thriving nation by successfully turning the party ideological work into the one instilling the fighting spirit and patriotism into the popular masses.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a very important speech there.
					
					 As his speech was over, the participants again broke into rousing cheers.
					
					 After listening his speech, all participants renewed their loyal pledge to become political activists of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il type and give full play to the might of the revolutionary idea of the party and mental power of all service personnel and people and thus creditably fulfill their honorable mission and duty as ideological officials of the party in the glorious era of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 A letter of pledge to the WPK was adopted there.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok made a closing address.

articles.title: Short Course for Ideological Officials Held
articles.content:
Short Course for Ideological Officials Held
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- There took place a short course for the participants in the 8th Conference of Ideological Officials of the Workers' Party of Korea here on Wednesday. 
					 The short course dealt with theoretical and practical matters arising in the work to firmly uphold the immortal exploits performed by leader Kim Jong Il in the field of the ideological work of the WPK, raise a strong wind of ideological, information and agitation campaigns and dynamically accelerate the building of a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 The course stressed the main contents of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's speech made at the conference. 
					
					 The course referred to tasks and ways for glorifying the immortal leadership exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in the field of the ideological work of the party. 
					
					 It underscored the need to always grasp Kim Jong Il's instructions and policies laid down for the field of the party's ideological work and devotedly implement them without delay. It also called on the ideological officials of the party to make strenuous efforts to improve their qualifications in their practical struggle. 
					
					 The course also dealt with the issue of directing the focus of the party's ideological work to the work for thoroughly establishing the monolithic leadership system of the party. 
					
					 It underlined the need to intensify the education in loyalty to the party and the leader to ensure that the party members and other working people absolutely trust their leaders, hold in high esteem and follow them to the last.
					
					 It called for conducting a dynamic ideological work so that Kim Jong Un's instructions and policies of the party may be devotedly carried out. 
					
					 The course put emphasis on raising a strong wind of ideological, information and agitation campaigns so as to give full play to the mental power of the masses.

articles.title: New Cambodian Ambassador Presents Credentials
articles.content:
New Cambodian Ambassador Presents Credentials
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Op Sisawada, new Cambodian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
					 He had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Jong Hak Jin, Up-and-Coming Wrestler
articles.content:
Jong Hak Jin, Up-and-Coming Wrestler
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Jong Hak Jin, a freestyle wrestler of the April 25 Sports Team, is mentioned as one of the competent wrestlers in the DPRK.
					 Jong won the 57 kilogram weight class at the International Senior FS Wrestling Tournament "Takhti Cup" by defeating Iranian, Japanese, Georgian, Mongolian and Kazak rivals.
					
					 He also took home gold at the 28th World Military Men's Wrestling Championship held in October last year. 
					
					 Jong began wrestling at the Juvenile Sports School in Cholsan County, North Phyongan Province at the age of 11. 
					
					 He proved successful at domestic tournaments, including the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games, attracting attention of wrestling experts.
					
					 Ri Myong Hak, a wrestling coach, told KCNA that Jong has a forte for leg hold.
					
					 Jong said it is his goal to win laurels at Olympic Games.

articles.title: Meritorious Historian
articles.content:
Meritorious Historian
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Educators in the DPRK consider it as a pride and honor to devote their all to developing the science and technology of the country and educating younger generations.
					 Among them is Prof. and Dr. Jon Ryong Chol, a department head of Songdo University of Education in Kaesong City.
					
					 Staying on the teacher for 48 years, he has steadily continued the research to investigate and unearth historical relics and remains in Kaesong City. He has also colligated and classified those historical relics and remains, checking historical references to them.
					
					 In particular, he made big contributions to unearthing over 20 historical relics like royal mausoleums and a large-sized stone Buddha, believed to date back to Koryo Kingdom (918-1392), and ascertaining the historical evidence to them.
					
					 He authored the book "Visiting Historic Relics in Kaesong".
					
					 He also wrote over 30 books, including "Medieval History of Korea", "Study in History of Castles in Korea", textbooks and reference books, as well as more than 50 kinds of treatises.
					
					 Meanwhile, he has made big efforts to bring up a number of students and teachers to be holders of academic titles.
					
					 He was honored to attend the Meeting of Korean Intellectuals and other national meetings.
					
					 Jon is a member of the History Society of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits for Building Economic Power
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits for Building Economic Power
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime devoted his all to laying solid foundation for building a socialist economic power.
					 With a grand plan to develop the country into a higher stage of knowledge-based economic power, he called for putting the machine-building industry on a CNC basis, a shortcut to reactivating the national economy.
					
					 Recalling the days when he was breaking a path to introducing the CNC system, he said that he made up his mind to update the machine-building industry though the country was in difficulties.
					
					 Thanks to his correct decision and wise guidance, the Huichon Ryonha General Machine Factory was successfully built into a model factory, heralding the start of industrial revolution in the new century.
					
					 The Juche-based systems of making iron, fertilizer and vinalon have been developed and introduced in the industrial establishments and fish farms and foodstuff factories built on a modern basis, thus laying a solid economic foundation for improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 Recollecting the undying exploits Kim Jong Il performed on behalf of the prosperity of the country and the people's wellbeing, the Korean people are now fully determined to unfailingly carry out his behests.

articles.title: Sweet-Potato Ice Cream Newly Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
Sweet-Potato Ice Cream Newly Produced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Sweet potato has been widely accepted by the foodstuff-processing factories in the DPRK.
					 Among the foodstuffs made from sweet potato is a kind of ice cream.
					
					 In this regard, So Ok Jin, a researcher of the Commerce Science Institute, told KCNA:
					
					 Sweet potato has the effect of activating metabolism and lowering cholesterol in human body. And it is efficacious against hypertension, cardiovascular diseases and cancer.
					
					 It is rich in starch and sugar and strong in viscosity.
					
					 The institute has developed a new kind of ice cream preserving the properties of sweet potato.
					
					 As the ice cream is mainly made from sweet potato, it can be easily prepared with less sugar and flavors. Its production method has been already put on a scientific basis and standardized.
					
					 Kim Hyang, living in Phyongchon District, Pyongyang, said that the ice cream is tastier than others for its peculiar flavor.
					
					 Researchers say that the ice cream will enjoy popularity among people.

articles.title: Halt to Foal Eagle and Key Resolve Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Foal Eagle and Key Resolve Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- 39 civic and social organizations in south Korea including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Solidarity for Progress and the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society held a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in demand of halt to the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills and conclusion of peace treaty on Feb. 24, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 At the conference the speakers said Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills are provocative and risky ones as they are being staged at a time when the reunion of separated families and relatives from the north and the south is under way.
					
					 The on-going military exercises are escalating the danger of war on the Korean peninsula as the "tailored deterrence strategy" and the "joint plan for coping with the provocation of a local war" are to be applied for the first time and large-scale combined landing drills staged as a part of the exercises, they noted. 
					
					 They strongly urged the authorities and the U.S. to immediately stop their joint military drills aimed to militarily stifle the north.
					
					 They demanded the U.S. roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and opt for the conclusion of a peace treaty with the latter.

articles.title: Abolition of "Security Law" Demanded in South Korea
articles.content:
Abolition of "Security Law" Demanded in South Korea
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held a regular general meeting in the Christian Church in Seoul on Feb. 22 at which it said that it would fight for the abolition of the "Security Law" and the release of all prisoners of conscience, according to Jaju Minbo, the south Korean internet paper.
					 There happened in south Korea abnormal phenomena that progressive activists who devoted themselves to independent reunification are put in jail whereas those involved in the illegal election are found not guilty, speakers said.
					
					 They accused the authorities of their repressive acts against the struggle for independent reunification, democracy and right to existence including the fabrication of a plotted rebellion case aimed to dismantle the Unified Progressive Party and suppression of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the participants in the Railway Trade Union's strike.
					
					 It is deplorable that the "Security Law" is still taking effect and the innocent prisoners of conscience are behind the bars by this law, they said, adding:
					
					 The Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy will wage a dynamic action to make the "Security Law" be abolished, all prisoners of conscience set free and check the attempt at disbanding the progressive political party. 
					
					 It is an urgent task of the Korean nation to reunify the country, they said, calling for implementing the south-north joint declarations to open an era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Bird flu broke out on a chicken farm in Ronsan, South Chungchong Province of south Korea, according to south Korean MBC on Feb. 22.
					 It was reportedly the fourth time that bird flu occurred in the province only.
					
					 This led to culling tens of thousands of chickens on the farm and other farms near it.
					
					 Ducks were found dead en masse in Ryongam, South Jolla Province, according to south Korean CBS on Feb. 23.

articles.title: Halt to Joint Military Drills Urged by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Halt to Joint Military Drills Urged by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China on Feb. 24 issued a statement titled "The U.S. should stop at once its Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills for aggression."
					 The statement accused the U.S. of kicking off Key Resolve and Foal Eagle across south Korea despite the unanimous opposition of all Koreans.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China term the large-scale joint military drills targeting the north the dangerous nuclear war provocations aimed to stifle the DPRK by force of arms and inflict nuclear holocausts upon Koreans, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, the very one threatening the peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia as it kicked off the dangerous saber-rattling in south Korea where nuclear weapons and facilities are stockpiled.
					
					 Trust and hostile acts cannot go together.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities should think twice about the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their anti-DPRK war moves and stop acting rashly and discontinue the reckless war drills at once.
					
					  The south Korean authorities should not dance to the tune of the U.S. saber-rattling, bearing deep in mind that it is a traitorous anti-reunification criminal act of hurting peace on the Korean peninsula and development of the inter-Korean relations to follow the U.S. criminal acts of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China urge the U.S. and south Korean authorities to immediately stop their reckless war drills against the DPRK.

articles.title: Koreans in China Reject US War Exercises
articles.content:
Koreans in China Reject US War Exercises
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China made public a statement titled "The joint military exercises for aggression should be stopped at once as they will disturb improved north-south relations" on Feb. 24.
					 The statement referred to the fact that a climate for improved relations between the north and the south is being created and the reunion of separated families and relatives took place in conformity with the unanimous desire and wish of the fellow countrymen.
					
					 Under this situation the U.S. kicked up Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises aimed to bring a dark cloud of war, a move to throw a wet blanket over such climate and harass the peace and national reunification, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Even if Washington craftily tries to hide the provocative and aggressive nature of the military exercises, it cannot cover up the danger of the exercises behind which its sinister attempt is lurked.
					
					 Any Korean, who loves the country and nation, should never tolerate it but turn out as one in the struggle to check and frustrate Washington's arrogant and vicious moves for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 Peace doesn't come of its own accord and the fierce struggle for peace against war is the only way to check and foil the war moves of the warmongers at home and abroad.
					
					 All the members of the Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China will rise up as one in the nationwide struggle to resolutely smash the U.S. scenario for a war against the DPRK and pave a wide avenue for improved north-south relations to defend the security and peace of the nation.

articles.title: War Exercises Blasted by Organization of Young Koreans in China
articles.content:
War Exercises Blasted by Organization of Young Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Youth Federation of Korean Nationals in China on Monday issued a statement titled "The south Korean authorities should not repeat the vicious cycle of escalating tension by bringing in foreign forces".
					 The statement recalled that the DPRK in its recent open letter sent to the south Korean authorities, various political parties, public organizations and other people called for reunifying the country by the concerted efforts of Koreans and stopping the hostile military actions including war drills for aggression.
					
					 The statement continued: 
					
					 The U.S. kicked off Key Resolve in south Korea at last, defying the above-said call, and it will be immediately followed by Foal Eagle, actions quite contrary to the efforts for reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south and peaceful reunification.
					
					 What is worse, the U.S. took such dangerous action as kicking off saber-rattling when all Koreans are sharing joy at the reunion of separated families and relatives from the north and the south.
					
					 We cannot repress towering resentment at the U.S. going mad in a bid to realize their ambition for aggression in disregard of the untold sufferings the Koreans are undergoing due to the split.
					
					 None of the Koreans wants to see a war break out, it concluded.

articles.title: Appeal of DFRK Supported by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Appeal of DFRK Supported by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement titled "We will work heart and soul to uphold the DPRK, our glorious motherland, for all ages " on February 23.
					 The statement said that Koreans in China received with deep emotion the appeal of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK) on February 20.
					
					 The nomination of supreme leader Kim Jong Un as a candidate for the deputy to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK is a manifestation of the unanimous loyalty of the people in the motherland and a great auspicious event guaranteeing the happiness and future of overseas compatriots, the statement said.
					
					 It expressed the conviction that the people of the motherland will demonstrate once again the invincible might of socialist Korea centered on the popular masses before the world in the election of the deputies to the SPA.
					
					 All Koreans in China will dynamically advance for the prosperity of the socialist motherland and accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Songun, rallied close around Kim Jong Un, the sun of the nation, it said, and went on:
					
					 The country's reunification, the greatest desire of the nation, is sure to be achieved as the DPRK holds in high esteem Kim Jong Un who is identical to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the van of the struggle for reunifying the country.
					
					 If all compatriots turn out as one under the banner of the three principles of national reunification -- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity -- and the June 15 joint declaration, a fresh phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity will be opened certainly.
					
					 All compatriots in China will work heart and soul to uphold the DPRK, our glorious motherland, forever, the statement concluded.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Urge S. Korea to Opt for Mending Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Urge S. Korea to Opt for Mending Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia released a statement titled "The U.S. and south Korean authorities should act in harmony with a climate for improving the north-south relations" on February 24.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The spring of reconciliation and dialogue comes thanks to the initiative proposals of the DPRK.
					
					 Koreans in the north and the south and overseas support the reunion of separated families and relatives and hope that there would be no antagonism and enmity between the compatriots any longer.
					
					 But, south Korea still does not keep the mutual agreement, sparking deep concern and disappointment among overseas Koreans.
					
					 The south Korean authorities finally kicked off the joint military exercises with the U.S. and do not completely halt acts of slandering the north.
					
					 This can never benefit south Korea.
					
					 One should respond to the call for reconciliation with correct understanding and proper acts.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clearly see the trend of times and the aspiration of all fellow countrymen and respond with genuine attitude to the expectation of the Korean nation and conscience of the world desirous of the peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We fully support the positive proposals of the DPRK for improving the inter-Korean relations and call upon the south Korean authorities to unhesitatingly opt for leading hard-won atmosphere of reconciliation to the wide-ranging dialogue and cooperation with reasonable judgment, concluded the statement.

articles.title: Korean in Russia Calls on S. Korea to Opt for Mending Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Korean in Russia Calls on S. Korea to Opt for Mending Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Ri Chae Son, vice-chairperson of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, issued a statement on Feb. 25 denouncing the south Korean authorities for kicking up the joint military exercises targeting the north which will only lead to the escalation of distrust and confrontation between the north and south.
					 No sooner had the south Korean authorities agreed on the issue of halting all acts of slandering the other party at the north-south high-level contact than they got hell-bent on the smear campaign against the north, while claiming that "emphasis on human rights in the north" and "psychological warfare against the north" are different from the above-said issue, the statement said.
					
					 Overseas compatriots were surprised by the claim made by the south Korean authorities who do not know about the realities of the DPRK, it noted.
					
					 It deplored that U.S.-south Korea Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises were kicked up despite the unanimous opposition of all fellow countrymen.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should no longer be used for the U.S. strategy barring the development of the north-south relations, it stressed, and went on:
					
					 They should bear in mind that if they stage ceaseless joint military exercises such as Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, kowtowing to the U.S., it will bring about the extermination of the nation, not peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The statement urged the south Korean authorities to implement the north-south agreement, stop at once all acts of slandering the other party and the nuclear war exercises which will lead to the escalation of distrust and confrontation only and take practical action for improving the north-south relations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed in Osaka of Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed in Osaka of Japan
 Tokyo, February 24 (KNS-KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) in Osaka City on Feb. 18 to mark the 72nd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were officials of the headquarters, organizations and enterprises of Chongryon in the prefecture and other compatriots.
					
					 At the meeting Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the headquarters, made a report.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was read out there.
					
					 Then followed a lecture.
					
					 Han Tong Song, director of the Publicity and Cultural Department of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, gave a lecture on the theme "Let us usher in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan along with the prosperous homeland full of confidence in victory."
					
					 He spoke of the stirring reality in the homeland ushering in a great heyday of Juche Korea under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He referred to the fact that all Koreans are making dynamic efforts to end the national division, mend the inter-Korean relations and usher in a new phase of independent reunification.
					
					 He called on the officials of Chongryon and other Koreans in Osaka to take the lead in the movement for making the 23rd congress of Chongryon a foundation for making a leap forward in the efforts to usher in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Koreans in US Stage Actions in Demand of Dismantlement of IS
articles.content:
Koreans in US Stage Actions in Demand of Dismantlement of IS
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. staged actions condemning the south Korean authorities for their fraud election in New York, Los Angeles and Washington on Feb. 21 and 22, according to Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S.
					 At a demonstration and meetings the participants said that the Intelligence Service (IS) should be dismantled immediately as it perpetrated the illegal and fraudulent election, desperately engaging itself in politically-motivated operations.
					
					 There continues the crackdown on the Unified Progressive Party, the opposition party, in south Korea, they charged.
					
					 They strongly demanded the abolition of the "Security Law" as it stamps out freedom of conscience and media in south Korea.

articles.title: Letter from Participants in Meeting of Presidential Council of WFTU
articles.content:
Letter from Participants in Meeting of Presidential Council of WFTU
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from participants in the meeting of the Presidential Council of the World Federation of Trade Unions (WFTU) held in Italy on Feb. 15.
					 The letter said that leader Kim Jong Il dedicated himself to happiness of the working masses all his life and reliably defended socialism from all threats, blackmails and sanctions of the imperialists.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's revolutionary idea and cause are being steadfastly carried forward by Kim Jong Un, it stressed.
					
					 The letter strongly demanded the U.S. and the south Korean authorities stop at once the dangerous military exercises which will lead the situation on the Korean peninsula and the north-south relations to catastrophe and unconditionally accept the crucial proposal and open letter of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 In the letter the WFTU expressed full sympathy and support for the DPRK's stand that foreign forces should be rejected, the stand of By Our Nation Itself be firmly adhered to and an atmosphere be created for improving the north-south relations if the reunification of Korea is to be achieved.
					
					 The WFTU will as ever extend invariable solidarity to the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and the whole Korean working class, the letter concluded.

articles.title: Organization for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Formed in Japan
articles.content:
Organization for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Formed in Japan
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism was inaugurated with due ceremony in Tokyo on February 15.
					 Present there were figures of Japanese organizations for the study of the Juche idea, masses and an official of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers referred to the significance of the inaugural ceremony and called for deeply studying and disseminating Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism to turn the present century into one in which the dignity of human beings is protected.
					
					 They underlined the need to establish independence in Japan through the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and increase the number of adherents of the Juche idea.
					
					 The ceremony elected Takao Kamakura, director of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, Masaji Ie, adviser to the National Liaison Council of the Societies for Study of Kim Jong Il's Works, Keizo Sumiya, chairperson of the Japanese Fukushima Liaison Council for the Study of Kimilsungism－Kimjongilism, and other figures advisers to the national liaison council.
					
					 Then, an inaugural declaration was adopted there.
					
					 The declaration said that the energetic activities of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, enabled them to know well that he will successfully carry forward and accomplish the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It stressed that the ceremony marked an occasion of vowing to more briskly study and disseminate Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in order to accomplish the cause of independence in Japan and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Russia and Ukraine and a regional body posted special write-ups on their internet homepages to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK on Feb. 16 posted articles including "Peerless patriot, great revolutionary" and "Invincible revolutionary banner" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and more than 10 photos showing his revolutionary activities.
					
					 Featured on its website were photos of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, and Marshal Kim Jong Un, "Song of General Kim Jong Il", an immortal revolutionary hymn, and a photo of Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the secret camp in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Articles praised the sacred revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who was born in Mt. Paektu as the son of guerillas and made great contributions to the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence under the unfurled banner of Juche and Songun.
					
					 Articles praising his undying exploits illustrated with his photos were also posted between Feb. 14 and 16 by the Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, the Russian Kirov Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Crimean Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed by Russian Papers
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed by Russian Papers
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Russian papers carried special write-ups from Feb. 8 to 19 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. The write-ups were illustrated with portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il, photos showing his revolutionary activities and photos of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Pri Armurskiye Wedomostsi in an article titled "Exploits performed for the cause of socialism" noted:
					
					 The greatest exploit performed by Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK Kim Jong Il was that he protected the destiny of socialism.
					
					 The next one was that he ushered in an era of new surge in the cause of socialism.
					
					 He energetically led the Korean people's struggle to build a thriving socialist nation, smashing the imperialists' moves against the DPRK.
					
					 The exploits he performed for the cause of socialism have been further glorified by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Khabarovski Express in an article titled "Great brilliant commander of Songun" said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership by inspecting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on Aug. 25, 1960.
					
					 The world progressive mankind was greatly impressed by his matchless pluck and guts as a peerlessly brilliant commander.
					
					 The DPRK which has won a victory after another under the uplifted banner of Songun has greatly encouraged the world progressives and powerfully promoted the cause of global independence.
					
					 Komsomolskaya Pravda in such articles as "Birth in Mt. Paektu" and "Impregnable fortress" praised the peerlessly great man for his glorious revolutionary career and undying exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) from Feb. 3 to 11.
					 They included a Korean film show, opening ceremony of book, photo and fine arts exhibition in Russia and book and photo exhibitions in Ethiopia and South Africa.
					
					 Displayed on the front walls of the venues of the events were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there were photos showing their revolutionary activities, famous works authored by them, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and fine art pieces associated with wisdom of Koreans.
					
					 Korean film "The International Friendship Exhibition House" was shown.
					
					 A vice-mayor of Dmitrov City of Moscow Region, Russia said that Kim Jong Il was the great leader of the Korean people and a teacher of the world progressives, who turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological power and military power and laid a solid foundation for building an economic power.
					
					 The general manager of the historic art centre in the city said the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by dedicating himself to the people all his life would always be remembered by the Korean people and the world progressive people.
					
					 The chairperson of the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il as a world elder statesman who devoted his all to the accomplishment of the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Seminars Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Seminars Held in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Peru, the DR Congo and Libya between February 14 and 16 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 40th anniversary of his proclamation of the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					 Present there were figures of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of the DR Congo, the Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in the DR Congo, the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of University of Kinshasa, the Libya-DPRK Friendship Association and the Sunbula International Friendship Club and masses.
					
					 The chairman of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il made public the work "On Some Immediate Tasks of Party Ideological Work for Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism" on February 19, 1974.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people made miracles and innovations in the socialist construction, holding high the banner of Kimilsungism under his leadership.
					
					 The revolutionary idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were being successfully carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speakers including the chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of the DR Congo said that Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and successfully applied it to revolution and construction, instilling confidence in the victory of socialism into the world progressive people. 
					
					 The chairman of the Libya-DPRK Friendship Association highly praised Kim Jong Il as a peerlessly brilliant Songun commander and expressed firm support and solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed in Thailand, Nigeria
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed in Thailand, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- There took place film shows in Thailand and Nigeria from Feb. 11 to 18 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Participants of film shows watched Korean films including "The International Friendship Exhibition House".
					
					 The manager of the Universal Surveying Company of Thailand said after watching the film:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il was born in the secret camp in Mt. Paektu and grew up, hearing the gun reports during the great anti-Japanese war as a lullaby, and nurtured wisdom and spirit as a brilliant commander beside the table for operational plans at the supreme command during the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 He started his Songun revolutionary leadership by giving field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960.
					
					 He entered Kim Il Sung University and conducted energetic revolutionary activities with a far-reaching plan to glorify Korea before the world.
					
					 After watching the film, I came to know better about the greatness of HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speakers at the film shows held in Nigeria praised Kim Jong Il for turning the DPRK into a politico-ideological power and military power by pursuing the original Songun politics, regarding children as the king of the country and showing deep loving care for them to bring them up. 
					
					 They were convinced that the Korean people would successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Open Letter Posted by Brazilian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Open Letter Posted by Brazilian Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's open letter to all voters across the country was posted by the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on its website on February 19.
					 The website carried a photo documenting his revolutionary activities.

articles.title: Clausurada VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos del PTC
articles.content:
Clausurada VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos del PTC
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 25 con solemnidad la segunda jornada de la VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Asistio al conclave el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Cuando el salio al salon de reunion, todos los participantes le recibieron con aclamaciones estruendosas y aplausos entusiastas.
					
					El Mariscal respondio a tales vitores enviando el saludo cordial a ellos quienes vinieron trabajando con abnegacion para el fortalecimiento de las labores ideologicas del partido.
					
					Continuaron las intervenciones en la reunion.
					
					Los oradores recordaron que acorde a la linea de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il de dar importancia a la idea, prepararon a todos los militantes del partido y los trabajadores como combatientes dispuestos a defender al lider, que confian unicamente en el partido y el lider, usando el ordinario sistema de las labores ideologicas, los metodos de divulgacion y agitacion y las bases de educacion.
					
					Enfatizaron que han sido testigos de la justeza y vitalidad de la teoria y la metodologia de las labores ideologicas en los dias en que al materializar estrictamente el metodo de divulgacion y agitacion al estilo de guerrilla antijaponesa y al organizar y desplegar dinamicamente el movimiento por la obtencion de la bandera roja de las tres revoluciones, estimularon energicamente a las masas a la materializacion de la idea del partido y la defensa de su politica incentivando el entusiasmo revolucionarios y la creatividad de ellas.
					
					Resaltaron las inmortales hazanas de direccion de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu, realizadas en la lucha por la identificacion ideologica de toda la sociedad, y la grandeza de la teoria ideologica, presentada por ellos.
					
					Analizaron y balancearon los exitos, las experiencias y los errores manifestados en el pasado en las labores ideologicas del partido.
					
					Ratificaron la importancia de la labor ideologica del partido en el importante periodo historico de la sucesion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Expresaron la decision de concentrarse en el establecimiento estricto del sistema de direccion unica del partido para consolidar la unidad ideo-volitiva entre el partido y las filas revolucionarias, de manera que se lleve a cabo la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.
					
					Juraron contribuir a la movilizacion de la potencial espiritual de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y la Corea de Kim Jong Il en la construccion de un Estado prospero al convertir las labores ideologicas en las vigorosas que estimulen la lucha y el patriotismo de las masas populares.
					
					Luego, el Mariscal pronuncio un discurso programatico.
					
					Terminado el discurso, los participantes volvieron a aclamarle.
					
					Todos los participantes, que escucharon el discurso, estaban decididos a cumplir la mision y papel de funcionario ideologico del partido en la gloriosa epoca de Kim Jong Un al movilizar la fuerza de la idea revolucionaria del PTC y toda la potencial espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo, siendo activistas politicos por el estilo de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Seguidamente, quedo aprobada la nota de juramento al partido.
					
					El discurso de clausura estuvo a cargo de Choe Thae Bok.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un toma foto con participantes en Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos de PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un toma foto con participantes en Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos de PTC
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tomo fotos de recuerdo con los participantes en la VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos del PTC.
					Cuando el Mariscal salio al lugar de filmacion, todos ellos le acogieron con efusivas aclamaciones de "!viva!"
					
					El Mariscal les respondio enviando el saludo cordial y felicito a los participantes quienes culminaron con exito la conferencia con elevado entusiasmo diciendo que el presente conclave, efectuado como una gran dimension sin precedente en la historia del PTC, sirve de oportunidad significativa que preparo el nuevo jalon de viraje para glorificar de generacion en generacion las inmortales hazanas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes con el poderio de la ideologia condujeron siempre a la victoria el partido y la revolucion e intensificar la campana ideologica, propaganda y agitacion segun la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo.
					
					Son muy grandes la confianza y esperanza que deposita el partido sobre los funcionarios ideologicos, destaco y manifesto su esperanza y conviccion de que ellos movilizaran a todos los uniformados y civiles a la sagrada lucha por abrir la era de prosperidad de la Corea del Songun al iniciar a la vez la ofensiva simultanea en el frente ideologico del partido.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Kim Chang Sop, Jo Yon Jun, Kim Kyong Ok, Ri Jae Il, Choe Hwi, Hwang Pyong So, Tong Yong Il y los secretarios responsables de comites provinciales del Partido.

articles.title: Efectuado cursillo para funcionarios ideologicos
articles.content:
Efectuado cursillo para funcionarios ideologicos
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en esta capital el cursillo para los participantes en la VIII Conferencia de los Funcionarios Ideologicos del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					En la ocasion se abordaron los temas teoricos y practicos que surgen en defender con firmeza las imborrables proezas acumuladas por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en su direccion sobre la rama ideologica del Partido y promover vigorosamente la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista al levantar una oleada fuerte de la batalla ideologica, la propaganda y la agitacion.
					
					Se dio destaque al contenido principal de la obra del Mariscal Kim Jong Un "Anticipemos la victoria definitiva con una ofensiva ideologica de caracter revolucionario".
					
					Fueron mencionados las tareas y remedios que se presentan para glorificar dichas hazanas del Dirigente.
					
					En el cursillo se dio enfasis en mantener constantemente y materializar a toda costa las instrucciones y las orientaciones dadas por el Dirigente sobre la labor ideologica del Partido y en esforzarse por elevar las capacidades en la practica.
					
					Acto seguido, se debatio el asunto de dar el enfoque del trabajo ideologico del Partido en establecer estrictamente el sistema de direccion unica del Partido.
					
					Se resalto la importancia de intensificar la educacion de la fidelidad al Partido y al lider para que los militantes del Partido y los demas trabajadores confien absolutamente y apoyen a su lider y a su dirigente.
					
					Se hizo hincapie en dinamizar la labor ideologica orientada a materializar a toda costa las instrucciones del Mariscal y las orientaciones del Partido.
					
					Igualmente, se dio destaque al problema de levantar una fuerte oleada de batalla ideologica, la propaganda y la agitacion para movilizar la potencial espiritual de las masas.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador camboyano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador camboyano
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- Op Sisawada presento el dia 26 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Reino de Camboya en Corea.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.
